name: maleness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being a man or a boy, or the fact of being the sex that fertilizes eggs, and does not produce babies or eggs itself: This is a book about maleness, and a reflection on the lives of men. The main challenge faced by women in rock is the maleness of their medium. See
male
More examplesFewer examplesIt was one of a generation of ads appealing to men's essential maleness.We often associate maleness with violence.Gender roles are the socially acceptable ways to express our femaleness or maleness.
